course_title: Special Topics in Religion: Holocaust Memory Europe/Israel

class_notes:
(Same as JS 271 2)
(This course satisfies the Religion major requirement:- Theme, Region.)

course_description: Variety of subjects pertaining to religion. Content will vary in successive offerings. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
